lead_paragraph: SHULDMAN--Chanka (Anna), died Sunday, January 17 at the age of 92. Born in Lodz, Poland, Anna was a survivor of the Holocaust and moved to Brooklyn after the War. Widow of Philip Shuldman, and mother to Marvin Shuldman and Renee Siebert. Beloved grandmother of four and great-grandmother of four. Anna was generous and kind and never asked for anything in return. She was sharp as a tack right to the end. 1/3
